review: I ordered for my parents while I was out of town, and when it got shipped, they kept saying it wasn't working. I thought it was because they're old and aren't good with technological stuff. I came back home a couple days ago for a family gathering, and told everyone we were going to watch a movie, old videos, etc. This chromecast wasn't working, and tried EVERY SINGLE POSSIBLE way, and followed instructions more than 10 times, but it's still not working. I'm now assuming youguys shipped one of the 'returned' ones, or fake ones. I'm kind of really angry, and I want a FULL refund back, and I will ship it in as soon as the money comes back into my account.
